column1: prompt

Refer to the given input and identify the correct answer. A country situated in the east of Italy is
(A) Austria
(B) Slovenia
(C) Switzerland
(D) Croatia
Generate a lead paragraph for a story about a robbery.
Check if the following sentence contains an error or not. He told me quietly where I can go.
Form a compound word with the given two words. Sight and see
Using the given sentence, come up with 3 similar sentences which uses the same information. The mice population flourished when humans disappeared from the island.
Change the sentence with the given word using synonyms and then make it a question. Cherish the time
Rewrite the given sentence so it can be used in an academic paper. The war declared by our country to the other country was an act of aggression.
Given a text, remove unnecessary adverbs. She ran swiftly to school.
Given two sentences, generate a third sentence which combine the two ideas together. He was always so calm. He would never raise his voice.
Develop a sentence which appropriately use the given vocabulary words prolific, demeanor
Imagine you are writing a script for a movie. Describe the house of the main character.
Summarize the advantages of taking a gap year.
Come up with a plan to save money on groceries.
Explain why using a computer for university assignments is beneficial.
Write a persuasive message to convince a customer to return to using your product.
You are helping a customer pick out a gift and they want something novel. Come up with a list of novel gift ideas.
What do people commonly associate with the color green?
Replace the missing word with a verb that makes the sentence meaningful. The sun ___ in the west.
Answer a FAQ about the product. What are the benefits/advantages of this product?
Write a description for a product that encourages shoppers to make purchases.
Explain what is required to make a successful YouTube channel.
Replace the words in bold with words or phrases that have the same meaning. My dog has horrible dyspnea.
Explain the general mechanism behind solar cells.
Given two letters, create a three-letter word. e and r
Name a film that stars Tom Hanks.
Define a modernist movement.
Take some text and edit it to add descriptive words to it. The wind was blowing.
Given two words, “house” and “spring”, create a five-word phrase.
Given the word “cat”, list three other words that are related to it.
Generate a story that involves a spaceship.
Construct a query that returns information about the Eiffel Tower.
Provide instructions for boiling an egg.

Check that the paragraph is correctly punctuated In finite mathematics two key concepts are sets and functions the former being a collection of objects the latter providing a way of relating the members of different sets
Estimate how long the following task will take Creating a website with content management system and basic template
Describe how the point is connected to a line
Classify the following pet’s breed I have a long-haired canine with a golden coat
Generate a solution for the following problem that involves binary search Given an array of size n, search for an element x
Determine the person responsible for the following action The project was completed on time
Calculate the circumference of the official ball of a basketball game The diameter of the ball is 29.5 inches
Create a metaphor to accurately describe the winter season.
Take the given sentence and replace the word 'cowardly' with the opposite of that meaning. The cowardly lion was scared of everything.
Write a question that can be used in a quiz to test knowledge of English grammar.
Explain how rainbows are formed in nature.
To what country does diaspora refer to?
Provide 3 examples of culture in language.
Generate a minimum 5 sentence story about a teacher and a student who meet in a library.
In one to two sentences explain how Intellectual Property is defined.
Describe a medicine that is used to treat an ailment associated with the heart
How does a bot give an answer to a query?
You are given with a robot, write an algorithm to make it move forward 20 steps and reverse back to the starting position.
How is the speed of a car calculated?
Generate a story about a town coming together to help someone in need.
Analyze the relationship between science and technology.
Create an algorithm to determine the middle element of a linked list.
Create a data set that classifies different types of fruits.
Create an algorithm to remove duplicates from a singly linked list.
Given a list of numbers, develop an algorithm to find the maximum sum of a subarray.

Compare two pieces of artwork and explain the differences between them. Piece A: Monet's "Water Lilies"
Piece B: Manet's "Olympia"
Given a sentence, determine all the adverbs it contains. She quickly ran up the stairs.
Describe an experience you had with a person of a different cultural background than you.
Suggest a family trip destination.

Rewrite the dialogue so that the tone is more polite. - Agent: I'm sorry, we can't do that.
- Customer: No way!
Imagine that you walk into a cafe to have a cup of coffee. Describe the experience in less than 100 words.
Provide a list of words that described this product. Chocolate
Give a list of items that a person can take on a camping trip.
Break the following phrase into smaller meaningful parts. inconceivablemisfortune
Recognize the language in the given text. 作为一个曾经的英文老师
Provide a logical extension to the given sentence. I was so proud of myself
State the main contribution of the paper "Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction".
Create a list of 5 tasks a virtual assistant can help with
Given a story, (add/edit/compare/remove) an element from it. Once upon a time there was a little girl who loved to read books.
Find the sum of 4703, 2884 and 4758.
Given an item, suggest different ways for it to be recycled. Cardboard
A student needs to answer the question: what is the theme of the novel To Kill a Mockingbird?
Suggest a holiday destination for a family of 5 with a budget of $2000.
Generate a positive phrase to describe a person. Person: My father
Generate a story about a conflict between two siblings.
Find the correct facts from the given list and delete the incorrect ones. The capital of India is Mumbai, California was the first state of USA, Apple is the symbol of Microsoft.
How many countries are part of UN?
Suggest some activities that you might do on a vacation at the beach.
Name a flower with purple petals and white centers.
Organizing the items below into categories. Key, Pen, Pencil, Eraser
Share a short story about a forgotten memory.
Create a 6th-grade level vocabulary quiz on the given word. Vivacious
Suggest a dish suitable for vegetarians.
Invent a new recipe using five of the ingredients below. Sea salt, olive oil, fish, potatoes, tomatoes
Distinguish between right and wrong in the given scenario. A student cheats on her test.
Rewrite the given sentence using jargon pertaining to computer engineering. We need to construct a data storage system.

Connect the dots by inventing a realistic conversation between two people. Person 1: I'm so stressed out.
Person 2:
Estimate the cost of a one-way plane ticket from Los Angeles to New York City.
Explain the physics behind the Doppler effect.
Determine the best option for investment. I have $20,000 and I want to invest in stocks.
